blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour

Class BehaviourComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase
      • blackengine.gameLogic.components.prefab.behaviour.BehaviourComponent

  • public class BehaviourComponent
extends ComponentBase
    An instance of this component class executes behaviours that have been added to it in order of their priority.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      BehaviourComponent()
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of BehaviourComponent.

      Constructor for creating a new instance of BehaviourComponent.

      Adds a behaviour to this components behaviour list.
      BehaviourComponent copy()

      Sets the Entity reference in all behaviours in this component to this components parent.

      Removes a behaviour from this component.
      void removeBehaviour(java.lang.String behaviourName)
      Removes a behaviour from this component.
      void update()
      Removes all behaviours that have been flagged for destruction and calls the tick() method on all behaviours that are present in this component.

    • Method Detail

      • addBehaviour

        public void addBehaviour(Behaviour behaviour)
        Adds a behaviour to this components behaviour list. Sets its entity reference to the parent of this component.
        Parameters:
        behaviour - The instance of Behaviour that will be added to this component.

      • removeBehaviour

        public void removeBehaviour(Behaviour behaviour)
        Removes a behaviour from this component. Sets its entity reference to null.
        Parameters:
        behaviour - The instance of Behaviour that will be removed.

      • removeBehaviour

        public void removeBehaviour(java.lang.String behaviourName)
        Removes a behaviour from this component. Sets its entity reference to null.
        Parameters:
        behaviourName - An instance of String that represents the name of the behaviour, and is defined as such in the behaviour that is to be removed.

      • onActivate

        public void onActivate()
        Sets the Entity reference in all behaviours in this component to this components parent.
        Overrides:
        onActivate in class ComponentBase

      • update

        public void update()
        Removes all behaviours that have been flagged for destruction and calls the tick() method on all behaviours that are present in this component.
        Overrides:
        update in class ComponentBase
